scripts.git:submodules:update: git submodule init && git submodule update ; git submodule foreach --recursive "git submodule init && git submodule update"
scripts.postinstall: npm run git:submodules:update ; npm run hardhat:init ; npm run hardhat:compile
scripts.hardhat:init:
if [ -e src/tools/hardhat/chain-secrets.json ] 
 then echo "" 
 else 
 echo {\"privateKey\": \"...\"} > src/tools/hardhat/chain-secrets.json 
 fi
scripts.hardhat:clean: rm -rf src/tools/hardhat/typechain-types && hardhat clean --config src/tools/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/tools/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:compile: npm run hardhat:clean && hardhat compile --config src/tools/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/tools/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:deploy:dev: npm run hardhat:compile && hardhat run src/tools/hardhat/scripts/deploy.ts --network hardhat --config src/tools/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/tools/hardhat/tsconfig.json
scripts.hardhat:deploy:local: npm run hardhat:compile && hardhat run src/tools/hardhat/scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost --config src/tools/hardhat/hardhat.config.ts --tsconfig src/tools/hardhat/tsconfig.json
